amendment.description: To provide additional funding for afterschool programs under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

action.text: Amendment SA 1609 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1609 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 49. Record Vote Number: 340.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1609.

Amendment SA 1609 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11280-11282, S11293-11294; text: CR S11280) To provide additional funding for afterschool programs under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1609 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 49. Record Vote Number: 340.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1609 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1542.
